Explore Barranquilla

Population: 1.2MM inhabitants
Geographic area: 166 km²
Weather: Average temperature: 27.4 °C
International events: Carnaval de Barranquilla
Museums and galleries: Parque Cultural, Museo del Caribe, Teatro Amira de la Rosa, Museo Romántico, Museo de Arte Moderno, and Museo del Carnaval
Touristic attractions: Bocas de ceniza, Magdalena river, Puerto Colombia, Pier, and Barranquilla Zoo
Restaurants: Jardines de Confucio, La Cueva, El Celler, La Piazetta, 360 Degrees (Hotel Dann Carlton Barranquilla)
